review_details: The temperature was awesome, the captain, his wife and his employee were very nice and were always proposing something to drink and to eat. We ate so many kind of fishes and it really worth it. We were only 3 customers on the boat so it was a very private tour. I recommend this activity to everyone!!
I went in this restaurant on sept 11th with my girlfriend. We had such a great night. The food was very tasty and the service was amazing!
Vue superbe et bonne nourriture. Cuisine et salle de bain très propre!! Excellent service de la part du propriétaire!!
